EmailTemplate.name: EU OB: Portal Access Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Portal Access
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon {!Contact.FirstName}. I manage partner experience for SunPower dealers in North America. You have recently joined our dealer network and I am working on providing you access to our customer portal and training site. You will shortly receive an automated message from SunPower Customer Care with your credentials. There is a short delay in this login information being ported to our training system. You should be able to navigate to SunPower University (from the link on the left) in a few hours.
Thank you for choosing to work with SunPower.
Regards,
Tom Dowley Partner Experience Manager – RLC North America SunPower Corporation 3939 North First Street t 408.457.2335 f 408.240.5400 c 650.575.7095 thomas.dowley@sunpowercorp.com www.sunpowercorp.com
